Sierra Yarn offers a product called Andean Spirit, which is a blend of 60% Baby Alpaca and 40% Peruvian Pima Cotton. The yarn is described as being luxuriously soft, lightweight, and classy. It is designed to keep up with the latest fashion trends and its blend of baby alpaca and Pima cotton makes it an exceptional experience. The yarn is air-jet technology which makes it lightweight and easy to knit with. The yarn is bigger than normal, so one skein is enough to make a small project such as a beanie, gloves, or a mini snood.

The benefits of this yarn include being lightweight, made from two of the most luxurious fibers in the world, soft as a cloud, warm and cozy. The yarn specifications are a blend of 60% Baby Alpaca and 40% Peruvian Pima Cotton, suitable for knitting and crochet, with a ball weight of 3.52oz, 100gr, worsted yarn weight and 220Yds (201mt) of yarn length, needles US 8 (5mm) or bigger, and should be hand washed in cold water and dried flat.

This yarn is versatile and perfect for making a cardigan, scarf, or even a blanket. Sierra Yarn provides you with the finest yarn, and it is up to the knitter to turn it into the perfect garment.
